title: How do Moblins Make Babies? - 20 Minutes of Tears Part 4 w/ Brian & Greg
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny  to get 10% off your first month.

We solve the Danny / Donald Glover connection.  

Follow Brian on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/brianaltano/
